                    <a href="javascript:void(0);" suda-uatrack="key=tblog_profile_v6&amp;value=topnav" class="S_txt1"><em class="W_ficon ficon_hot S_ficon">ì</em>热门</a>
                    <span class="ani_border"></span>
                </li>
                <li class="tab_li" node-type="tab_other" action-type="search_type">
                    <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1">
                        <span class="txt" node-type="menutext">
                                                            更多                                                    </span>
                        <i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down W_f16 S_ficon" node-type="morebtn">c</i>
                    </a>
                    <span class="ani_border"></span>
                </li>
            </ul>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%93%E5%88%97%E5%8C%85%E5%8E%A2%E8%BF%90%E9%80%81%E5%8A%A1%E5%B7%A5%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%9827%E4%B8%87%E4%BA%BA%E6%AC%A1%23&amp;from=default">#专列包厢运送务工人员27万人次#</a>】国铁集团客运部主任黄欣：2月16日起至昨天，一共组织开行务工专列246列、包车厢运输1100辆，运送务工人员达27万人次。近期又继续安排了25列专列和包厢99辆。涉及全国20多个省市，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%9C%80%E8%BF%9C%E5%8A%A1%E5%B7%A5%E4%B8%93%E5%88%97%E4%BB%8E%E7%94%98%E8%82%83%E5%88%B0%E7%A6%8F%E5%BB%BA%23&amp;from=default">#最远务工专列从甘肃到福建#</a>，开行里程达2500公里。<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4479867946553879:1042163-video:1042163%3A4479868533145626:page_100206_home:2656274875:4479867946553879:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A67rHpYq" alt="http://t.cn/A67rHpYq" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻"><img usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.1024/002TLsr9ly8gk0aztvfa4j60u00u0gng02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609493236&amp;ssig=pr5uiE42DH" width="50" height="50" alt="央视新闻" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4479866424141377" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IxvGOhnmp?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-07 15:40" date="1583566850000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4479866424141377:fromprofile"> 2020-3-7 15:40</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%8D%E5%B7%A5%E5%8C%85%E8%BD%A6%E4%B8%AD%E9%80%94%E4%B8%A5%E7%A6%81%E4%B8%8A%E4%B8%8B%E5%AE%A2%23&amp;from=default">#复工包车中途严禁上下客#</a>】包车运输复工人员如何加强防控？交通运输部运输服务司副司长蔡团结：①交通运输场站和交通运输工具必须分级分区施策；②高、中风险区域包车必须把实载率控制在50%，隔开就坐；③确保直达，复工包车中途严禁上下客；④遇到紧急情况第一时间送去留观站；⑤司乘人员必须戴口 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IxvGOhnmp" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4479866424141377:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4479866424141377&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%87%BA%E9%99%A2%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB%E8%A7%82%E5%AF%9F28%E5%A4%A9%23&amp;from=default">#武汉出院患者隔离观察28天#</a>】中央指导组社区防控专家组负责人吴浩：武汉出院患者要进行14天集中隔离观察和14天居家医学隔离观察，共28天隔离观察期。集中隔离观察一般是在酒店、培训学校等改造的医学隔离点进行，每个隔离点按每50个人一位医生、一位护士进行配比，还有生活保障人员。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IxvtIjAwQ" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4479858304668652:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4479858304668652&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4479848418737535" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IxvdLAF1Z?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-07 14:29" date="1583562557000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4479848418737535:fromprofile"> 2020-3-7 14:29</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://weibo.com/" rel="nofollow">正能量 · 视频社区</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%B5%8F%E6%97%A5%E8%90%BD%E8%80%81%E4%BA%BA%E5%BF%83%E6%83%85%E5%A5%BD%E4%BA%86%E4%BC%9A%E5%93%BC%E6%AD%8C%23&amp;from=default">#赏日落老人心情好了会哼歌#</a>】近日，一张医患共赏日落的照片温暖了许多人。医生刘凯说，照片中的老人年轻时是小提琴手，刚住院时心情很低落，为调节心态，医护人员常陪老人聊音乐。现在，老人病情好转，心情也开朗了许多，还会哼起歌：“何日君再来，喝完了这杯，请进点小菜，人生能得几回醉……”&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IxvdLAF1Z" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4479848418737535:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4479848418737535&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【直播！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%8A%E6%B5%B7%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E5%B7%A5%E4%BD%9C%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#上海疫情防控工作发布会#</a>】6日，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%8A%E6%B5%B7%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B3%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#上海新增境外输入病例3例#</a>。今天下午，上海市召开疫情防控工作新闻发布会，邀请上海市卫健委、上海海关、市民政局等负责人出席，并介绍上海如何形成口岸防疫闭环。关注↓（总台央视记者盛瑾瑜） <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4479841745395665:1034-video:1034%3A4479851566923803:page_100206_home:2656274875:4479841745395665:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A67rbaan" alt="http://t.cn/A67rbaan" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#全球抗疫第一线#</a>【直播！关注日韩疫情】日韩新冠肺炎确诊人数持续增加。在日本，室内音乐会等集体活动是感染者增加的重要原因，日本政府决定推进修改相关法案；在韩国，此前被称为“净区”的安山市今天也出现确诊患者。总台记者解读防疫形势↓关注！（总台记者王梦 李大杰 张昀）&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ixv0kyplZ" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4479840088200615:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4479840088200615&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%9C%80%E7%BE%8E%E7%9A%84%E5%A5%B9%23&amp;from=default">#最美的她#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E7%9A%84%E6%9C%80%E7%BE%8E%E5%A4%9C%E8%A1%8C%E8%80%85%23&amp;from=default">#守护武汉的最美夜行者#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">致敬！】凌晨2点，军队支援湖北医疗队的夜班队员开始工作。吃块巧克力补充能量，穿上纸尿裤、防护服，忙碌的一夜就开始了。查看病人、输液、打扫卫生、处理医疗垃圾……一直到上午10点半才能休息。辛苦了，武汉的最美夜行者！有你们守护，很安心！ ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IxuQcFwzu" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4479833809896656:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4479833809896656&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【征集！致敬战疫一线的她，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%BA%E5%A5%B9%E5%86%99%E8%AF%97%23&amp;from=default">#为她写诗#</a>！】“所有我曾称道的美丽，都不及她被遮住的脸庞”；“不敢问君何时归，归时定带春光来”……明天<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%232020%E5%A6%87%E5%A5%B3%E8%8A%82%23&amp;from=default">#2020妇女节#</a>，带话题<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%BA%E5%A5%B9%E5%86%99%E8%AF%97%23&amp;from=default">#为她写诗#</a>发微博，给奋战在一线的她们，送一份独特的礼物！转发参与！ ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E7%88%B7%E7%88%B7%E7%BB%99%E5%AD%A9%E5%AD%90%E4%BB%AC%E7%9A%84%E5%9B%9E%E4%BF%A1%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山爷爷给孩子们的回信#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9C%A8%E5%AE%B6%E5%A5%BD%E5%A5%BD%E5%AD%A6%E4%B9%A0%E4%B9%9F%E6%98%AF%E4%B8%8E%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E6%88%98%E6%96%97%23&amp;from=default">#在家好好学习也是与疫情战斗#</a>】钟南山：你们有害怕、也有担忧；但我更多地看到了你们的勇气和理想。新冠肺炎不是中国的疾病，而是人类的疾病。希望你们相信国家，相信白衣天使战队，无论是在一线抗疫，还是在家学习，我们都是在与疾病进行战斗。                                            </div>

                                <a suda-uatrack="key=feed_headnick&amp;value=transuser_nick:4479778830982310" node-type="feed_list_originNick" class="W_fb S_txt1" nick-name="央视新闻" bpfilter="page_frame" href="/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_">@央视新闻</a><a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a>                            </div>
                            <div class="WB_text" node-type="feed_list_reason">
                                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E7%88%B7%E7%88%B7%E7%BB%99%E5%AD%A9%E5%AD%90%E4%BB%AC%E7%9A%84%E5%9B%9E%E4%BF%A1%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山爷爷给孩子们的回信#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】这段时间，钟南山院士收到了许多来自孩子们的信，有的字迹工整，有的笔触稚嫩，有肖像画，也有手抄报……钟院士认真阅读了每封来信，并亲自回信，写下了对青少年的寄语：用知识缝制铠甲，不远的将来，各行各业都将由你们披甲上阵。希望你们不惧艰辛、勇敢前行！（总 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4479778830982310:2656274875" href="/2656274875/Ixtpx47xI" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4479778830982310">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4479815153403761" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ixum7ehtn?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-07 12:17" date="1583554626000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4479815153403761:fromprofile"> 2020-3-7 12:17</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E8%BF%BD%E6%8E%88%E5%A4%8F%E6%80%9D%E6%80%9D%E7%AD%894%E4%BA%BA%E4%B8%BA%E4%B8%89%E5%85%AB%E7%BA%A2%E6%97%97%E6%89%8B%23&amp;from=default">#湖北追授夏思思等4人为三八红旗手#</a>】近日，湖北省人社厅、湖北省妇联追授董李会、陈桂荣、罗桂梅、夏思思4位牺牲在疫情防控一线的优秀女性“湖北省三八红旗手”称号。<br>董李会，1979年12月出生，生前系荆州市荆州区荆州高新技术产业园区城南高新园卫健办主任。在新冠肺炎防控关键时期，她坚守岗位、 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ixum7ehtn" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4479815153403761:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4479815153403761&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%9C%80%E7%BE%8E%E7%9A%84%E5%A5%B9%23&amp;from=default">#最美的她#</a>【直播！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%232020%E5%A6%87%E5%A5%B3%E8%8A%82%23&amp;from=default">#2020妇女节#</a>特别访谈】支援湖北的医疗队护士中近九成是女性；火神山、雷神山医院建设基地，“基建铁娘子”争分夺秒；95后女医生骑行300多公里赶回武汉……今天，<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%A4%AE%E8%A7%86%E6%96%B0%E9%97%BB?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=央视新闻">@央视新闻</a> 连线8位各行各业的工作者，向战疫一线温柔而坚韧的力量致敬！关注！ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4479812188226874:1034-video:1034%3A4479852191875111:page_100206_home:2656274875:4479812188226874:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A67BWTPy" alt="http://t.cn/A67BWTPy" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC66%E4%BA%BA%E5%9B%A0%E8%81%9A%E4%BC%97%E8%B5%8C%E5%8D%9A%E8%A2%AB%E6%9F%A5%E5%A4%84%23&amp;from=default">#北京66人因聚众赌博被查处#</a>】北京警方今日通报：1月24日以来，北京警方共端掉赌博窝点16个，查处涉赌人员66名，其中，刑事拘留4人，行政拘留62人。警方提示：赌博本身就违法，在抗击疫情的关键时期，聚众赌博更极易造成疫情传播和扩散。警方将持续开展依法打击，周知！（总台央视记者赵学荣） ​​​​                                            </div>

    </div>
        <!-- super card-->

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4479791891781687" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IxtKB7tuT?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-07 10:44" date="1583549080000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4479791891781687:fromprofile"> 2020-3-7 10:44</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%AE%E8%A7%86%E8%AE%B0%E8%80%85%E8%A2%AB%E6%8A%A4%E5%A3%AB%E6%91%81%E4%BD%8F%E5%86%B2%E7%9C%BC%E7%9D%9B%23&amp;from=default">#央视记者被护士摁住冲眼睛#</a>】昨天，总台央视记者在进入武汉的医院隔离区报道后，脱防护服时，护目镜不慎蹭到眼睛。护士们生怕他被感染，一出隔离区，马上摁着记者用生理盐水帮他冲洗眼睛↓↓网友：看着好心疼！记者也要保护好自己啊，谢谢贴心的护士小姐姐~<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">（总台央视记者马丽君 张鹏军）&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IxtKB7tuT" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4479791891781687:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4479791891781687&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4479778830982310" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ixtpx47xI?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-07 09:52" date="1583545966000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4479778830982310:fromprofile"> 2020-3-7 09:52</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E7%88%B7%E7%88%B7%E7%BB%99%E5%AD%A9%E5%AD%90%E4%BB%AC%E7%9A%84%E5%9B%9E%E4%BF%A1%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山爷爷给孩子们的回信#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】这段时间，钟南山院士收到了许多来自孩子们的信，有的字迹工整，有的笔触稚嫩，有肖像画，也有手抄报……钟院士认真阅读了每封来信，并亲自回信，写下了对青少年的寄语：用知识缝制铠甲，不远的将来，各行各业都将由你们披甲上阵。希望你们不惧艰辛、勇敢前行！（总 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ixtpx47xI" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4479778830982310:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4479778830982310&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9F%A9%E5%9B%BD%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E5%8D%87%E8%87%B36767%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#韩国累计确诊升至6767例#</a>】韩国中央防疫对策本部7日通报，从6日零时至7日零时，韩国共新增新冠肺炎确诊病例483例。目前，韩国新冠肺炎累计确诊感染病例达6767例。（总台记者李大杰） ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%8A%E6%B5%B7%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B3%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#上海新增境外输入病例3例#</a> 均在伊朗留学】据上海卫健委通报，6日0—12时，上海市排除新型冠状病毒肺炎疑似病例2例；新增治愈出院3例；新增3例确诊病例，为境外输入型病例。6日12—24时，上海市排除新型冠状病毒肺炎疑似病例17例；无新增确诊病例。<br>3例确诊病例中，2例为中国宁夏籍，1例为中国甘肃籍 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ixt4Q26AB" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4479766000501989:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4479766000501989&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E4%E4%BE%8B%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A3%E4%BE%8B%E4%B8%BA%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%23&amp;from=default">#北京新增4例确诊3例为境外输入#</a> 治愈出院5例】3月6日0时至24时，北京新增4例新冠肺炎确诊病例，3例来自意大利的境外输入病例；1例是北京市本地确诊病例，该病例2月6日为疑似病例收治在定点医院，住院期间3次核酸检测为阴性，2月20日出院，因居家隔离条件受限，至集中隔离点观察14天，3月5日复查，核 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IxsZF57y2" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4479762791220658:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4479762791220658&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E5%A4%96%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E25%E4%BE%8B%E4%B8%AD24%E4%BE%8B%E4%B8%BA%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%23&amp;from=default">#湖北外新增25例中24例为境外输入#</a>【严防境外疫情输入！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2331%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A524%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#31省区市新增境外输入24例#</a>】据国家卫健委通报，3月6日0—24时，新增报告境外输入确诊病例24例（甘肃17例，北京3例，上海3例，广东1例）。截至3月6日24时，累计报告境外输入确诊病例60例。 ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4479754163510304" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IxsLKeJbO?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-07 08:14" date="1583540085000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4479754163510304:fromprofile"> 2020-3-7 08:14</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#全球抗疫第一线#</a>【世卫组织：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A17481%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#中国境外确诊17481例新冠肺炎#</a>】当地时间6日，世卫组织发布最新一期新冠肺炎情况报告：截至欧洲中部时间6日上午10时，中国境外共88个国家/领地/地区确诊新冠肺炎17481例。（总台记者朱赫） ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4479749688241737" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IxsEwyA3f?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-07 07:56" date="1583539018000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4479749688241737:fromprofile"> 2020-3-7 07:56</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#全球抗疫第一线#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E8%87%B3%E5%B0%8A%E5%85%AC%E4%B8%BB%E5%8F%B721%E4%BA%BA%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%23&amp;from=default">#美国至尊公主号21人确诊#</a> 船上共有约3500人】美国副总统彭斯6日在白宫发布会上宣布，当天，正在离岸隔离的“至尊公主号”上共有46人接受新冠病毒检测，其中21人确诊，包括19名船员及2名游客。彭斯表示，本周末将采取措施，将“至尊公主号”停靠在非商业码头，船上约3500人将陆续接 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IxsppzZF7" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4479740318578513:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4479740318578513&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数等于1，只显示图片-->
                
				 		    <!--picture_count == 1-->
    <ul class="WB_media_a  WB_media_a_m1 clearfix" action-data="isPrivate=0&amp;relation=0&amp;clear_picSrc=%2F%2Fwx1.sinaimg.cn%2Fmw690%2F9e5389bbly1gcl9gmh23bj20m80m8wjq.jpg">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#全球抗疫第一线#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E5%A2%9E%E8%87%B34636%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#意大利确诊病例增至4636例#</a>】当地时间6日18时，意大利民防部门负责人、新冠病毒应急委员会专员安杰洛·博雷利在发布会上表示，意大利现存病例3916例，累计523人治愈；新增死亡病例49例，累计死亡病例197例。截至目前，意大利累计确诊新冠肺炎病例4636例。（总台记者邓宗宇） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%88%91%E7%9A%84%E5%90%8C%E4%B9%A1%E8%8B%B1%E9%9B%84%23&amp;from=default">#我的同乡英雄#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%90%8C%E5%A8%83%E7%A5%9D%E7%A6%8F%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E5%89%8D%E7%BA%BF%E6%8A%A4%E5%A3%AB%E5%A6%88%E5%A6%88%23&amp;from=default">#萌娃祝福抗疫前线护士妈妈#</a>】上海市东方医院护士长高彩萍，现任武汉客厅方舱医院护理部副主任，20多天里已带队完成近2500人次护理。来到武汉后，她最牵挂家里的孩子。近日，她收到儿子邵一晨的祝福视频，“妈妈一定要保护好自己，我想你”。宝贝，谢谢你的妈妈，你是最坚定的啦啦队！ ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IxpHyopi9" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4479636245817097:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4479636245817097&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【9岁患者对医护人员说：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%88%91%E6%9B%BF%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E8%B0%A2%E8%B0%A2%E4%BD%A0%E4%BB%AC%23&amp;from=default">#我替武汉谢谢你们#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/6e/2018new_leimu_org.png" title="[泪]" alt="[泪]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】武汉方舱医院9岁的患者雯雯，一家人均被感染新冠肺炎，因为病情发展程度不同被分散隔离。近日，雯雯出院了，得知消息，医疗队员赶来送行，为她擦干眼泪，鼓励她要坚强起来。而小女孩的一句话，却让医护人员落泪了...为爱转发！<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4479629094009680:2017607-video:2017607%3A4479252184104975:page_100206_home:2656274875:4479629094009680:2656274875" title="看看新闻Knews的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A67RhkfD" alt="http://t.cn/A67RhkfD" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>看看新闻Knews的秒拍视频</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ixpw1gP6g" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4479629094009680:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4479629094009680&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                <li><a action-type="thrid_rend_iframe" href="javascript:void(0)" suda-data="" action-data="width=660&amp;height=556&amp;mid=4479616289021689&amp;src=%2F%2Fpromote.vip.weibo.com%2Fpromoteadvance%3Fdai_tou%3Dpc_profile_01%26touid%3D2656274875%26mid%3D4479616289021689&amp;title=推广" title="帮上头条">帮上头条</a></li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <li>
                                <span class="hover">
                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IxpbmBQX7&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>

        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻"><img usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.1024/002TLsr9ly8gk0aztvfa4j60u00u0gng02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609493268&amp;ssig=0POjVFrHy7" width="50" height="50" alt="央视新闻" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4479616289021689" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IxpbmBQX7?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-06 23:06" date="1583507213000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4479616289021689:fromprofile"> 2020-3-6 23:06</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%BB%E6%92%AD%E8%AF%B4%E8%81%94%E6%92%AD%23&amp;from=default">#主播说联播#</a>【“疫”往、“吾”前！】从目前的疫情防控形势来看，向好的趋势已经越来越明显，各地的复工复产率也在稳步提升，这些都为经济社会全面恢复正常，为打赢脱贫攻坚战创造了有利条件。只要我们加倍努力，慎终如始，无论是战病毒，还是战贫困，都会“疫”往、吾前。加油！&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IxpbmBQX7" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4479616289021689:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4479616289021689&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4479608894461287" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IxoZriIAf?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-06 22:37" date="1583505450000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4479608894461287:fromprofile"> 2020-3-6 22:37</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%94%98%E8%82%83%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E17%E4%BE%8B%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#甘肃新增17例境外输入新冠肺炎#</a> 累计境外输入确诊病例28例 甘肃累计确诊病例119例】 3月5日20时至3月6日20时，甘肃本地无新增病例。截止3月6日20时，甘肃本地累计报告新型冠状病毒肺炎确诊病例91例，累计治愈出院87例，累计死亡病例2例。现有2例在定点医院进行隔离治疗，其中兰州市1例、定西市1例。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IxoZriIAf" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4479608894461287:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4479608894461287&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

style=\"display:none\"><\/div>\n\n            <div class=\"WB_text W_f14\" node-type=\"feed_list_content\" nick-name=\"央视新闻\">\n                                                                                                                        【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%87%BA%E9%99%A2%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB%E8%A7%82%E5%AF%9F28%E5%A4%A9%23&from=default\">#武汉出院患者隔离观察28天#<\/a>】中央指导组社区防控专家组负责人吴浩：武汉出院患者要进行14天集中隔离观察和14天居家医学隔离观察，共28天隔离观察期。集中隔离观察一般是在酒店、培训学校等改造的医学隔离点进行，每个隔离点按每50个人一位医生、一位护士进行配比，还有生活保障人员。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a                                                                                   【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\"                              【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E5%9C%A8%E5%AE%B6%E5%A5%BD%E5%A5%BD%E5%AD%A6%E4%B9%A0%E4%B9%9F%E6%98%AF%E4%B8%8E%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E6%88%98%E6%96%97%23&from=default\">#在家好好学习也是与疫情战斗#<\/a>】钟南山：你们有害怕、也有担忧；但我更多地看到了你们的勇气和理想。新冠肺炎不是中国的疾病，而是人类的疾病。希望你们相信国家，相信白衣天使战队，无论是在一线抗疫，还是在家学习，我们都是在与疾病进行战斗。 class=\"WB_text\" node-type=\"feed_list_reason\">\n                                                                                                                                        【<a class=\"W_img_face\" render=\"ext\" src=\"\/\/img.t.sinajs.cn\/t4\/appstyle\/expression\/ext\/normal\/8a\/2018new_xin_org.png\" title=\"[心]\" alt=    \"[心]\" type=\"face\" \/>】这段时间，钟南山院士收到了许多来自孩子们的信，有的字迹工整，有的笔触稚嫩，有肖像画，也有手抄报……钟院士认真阅读了每封来信，并亲自回信，写下了对青少年的寄语：用知识缝制铠甲，不远的将来，各行各业都将由你们披甲上阵。希望你们不惧艰辛、勇敢前行！（总 ​​​​...<a target=\"_blank\" class=\"WB_text_opt\"
